name: Lys (Recursifist)
description:
Welcome aboard the Lys. We're a Dyson Sphere Spacecraft on our pioneer mission to survive the heat death of the known universe! We are racing against entropy! Gather enough energy to birth new bubble universes to escape to. Heat death always nears! There's antiparticles cancellations, black holes and the constant expanse... How long can we survive?

Lys is a short hard-science-fiction mini-game with simpler game mechanics, pleasing visuals and unique music. It lightly explores topics of Physics, Cosmology and the end of the known universe.

Built with Unity2D, developer's first game, inspired by Stephen Hawking's last published manuscript on Bubble Universes.
